name: Poisoned Egg
text: You transform the contents of a normal egg into a single dose of small centipede poison (injury; save DC 11; frequency 1/round for 4 rounds; effect 1 Dex; cure 1 save). The poison reverts to a normal egg at the end of the spell’s duration (the reverted egg substance is harmless unless the poisoned creature is vulnerable to eggs). The egg may be raw or cooked but must be whole and not empty when you cast the spell. When applying the poisoned egg’s contents to a weapon, the wielder has no chance of poisoning herself, as though she had the poison use class feature.
text_zh:
你将一个正常的蛋(像是鸡蛋)的内容物转变成为单剂量的小蜈蚣毒(伤口; 豁免DC11; 1d2敏捷/1d2敏捷)。此毒剂在法术持续时间结束后恢复为正常的蛋(除非中毒的生物惧怕蛋(vulnerable to eggs)，不然恢复原样的蛋其内容物是无害的)，就算次要伤害没有发生。蛋可以是生的或熟的，但当你在施展此法术时，蛋必须是完整的而且不能是空的。

粗心大意，将蛋用在武器上的投毒者很快会发现蛋会阻塞鞘，最后会开始腐烂; 在教会中，会称呼这种人为「蛋童(egg boy)」这是一种轻微的侮辱，用来暗示一个人缺乏选见或是做事不会考虑后果。
